title: I'm really sad and lonely and it's come to a point that even listening to music that I once loved makes me feel sick. What do I do? - Quora

response.answer_text: I am so sorry you are sad and lonely, friend! Is there a trusted friend or family member you can reach out to? I know of a wonderful organization that offers free counseling consultation and support you. Please let me know if you need details to contact them. Are there some hobbies/ activities that you can get involved in? This might help divert your mind from your loneliness.
Share your feelings in a piece of paper , drink water , calm yourself down, go down to get some fresh air , talk to friends on quora , my friend 🙂😃
